Package commandLine

Class GameEnviroment

  • java.lang.Object
    • commandLine.GameEnviroment

extends java.lang.Object
    Allows the game to be played through a command line
    Author:
    hoo42, rvo16

        Lets the player select an option based on the given parameters
        Parameters:
        input - the Scanner shared between methods
        messages - the list of methods telling the player their options
        lowerBound - the lower bound that the chosen option must be greater than
        upperBound - the upper bound that the chosen option must be less than
        Returns:
        the selected option

      • choose

        private static int choose​(java.util.Scanner input,
                          java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> messages,
                          int bound,
                          boolean isLowerBound)
        Lets the player select an option based on the given parameters
        Parameters:
        input - the Scanner shared between methods
        messages - the list of methods telling the player their options
        bound - the bound that the chosen option must be greater or less than depending on isLowerBound
        isLowerBound - true if the given bound is used as a lower bound; false otherwise
        Returns:
        the selected option
